text: Flèche d'Emeraude is a single-day road bicycle race to be held annually from 2011 in April in a circuit around Saint-Malo, Brittany, France. The race will be organized as a 1.1 event on the UCI Europe Tour. == Winners == Category:UCI Europe Tour races Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2011 Category:Cycle races in France Category:2011 establishments in France
title: Flèche d'Emeraude
